title: Restoring Trust in Capitalism, The Business of Private Aviation
itunes:title: Restoring Trust in Capitalism, The Business of Private Aviation
description:
Anat Admati, Finance and Economics Professor at Stanford Graduate School of Business, shares her thoughts on how Business Schools can help restore trust in capitalism. John Owen, CEO of Airshare, talks about the business of private aviation and expanding into the upper Midwest. 

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
